sourcesContent:
<template>
  <SaveButton @btnClk="saveData" />
  <SaveButton @btnClk="loadData" />
</template>

<script>

import LoadButton from './components/LoadButton.vue';
import SaveButton from './components/SaveButton.vue';


const circle = 0;
const square = 1;
const triangle = 2;
const segmentline = 3;
const ellipse  = 4;
const  rectangle= 5;

export default {
  name: 'App',
  data() {
    return {
      shapes: [[], [], [], [], [], []]
    }
  },
  components: {
    SaveButton,
    LoadButton
  },
  methods: {
    async saveData(){
      
      await fetch( '', {
        method: 'post',
        headers: {
              'Content-type': "application/json; charset=UTF-8"
            },
            body: JSON.stringify({
              program:  this.shapes
            }),
      });
    

    },
    async loadData(){
      
      const result = await fetch('');

      this.shapes = result.json()

    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>
